豽字的基本解释

豽
nà
古同“貀”。
猴类的动物。

豽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nà］
［《廣韻》女滑切，入黠，娘。］
同“貀1”。
(1)同“貀”。
(2)兽名。猴类动物。

豽字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【豸字部】　豽； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1200第09
【集韻】女滑切，音肭。【爾雅·釋獸】貀無前足。【釋文】貀，本又作豽。【註】似狗，豹文，有角。互詳貀字註。【後漢·鮮?傳】又有貂、豽、鼲子，皮毛柔蝡，故天下以爲名裘。【註】豽，猴屬也。【晉書·東夷傳】夫餘國出善馬及貂、豽。【集韻】亦作?。猴字原从豸作。

豽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
豽字的起名意思

暂无。

Glutinous rice

Monkey animals.

[①]［nà］
["Guangyun" female slide cut, enter the point, mother. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Zi Character Department】　豽; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1200 09
[Jiyun] female slippery cut, sound 肭. 【Erya·Shi Beast】The fish has no forefoot. 【Explanation】Tiao, this is also called 貀. 【Note】Like a dog, leopard text, with horns. Mutual detailed notes on the word 貀. [Later Han·Xian? Biography] There are mink, fermented rice, and scorpion, their fur is soft and creepy, so the world thinks it is the famous fur. [Note] 豽, also of the monkey genus. [Book of Jin·Dongyi Biography] Husband Yu Kingdom gave out good horses, mink and sable. [Ji Yun] also made?. The monkey character was originally made from 豸.
